content.question: In the Renaissance interior shown, the architect included

choices.label: the use of wall niches to connect the central space with the ambulatory
vaulted side aisles to provide additional space for visitors
contrasting stone for pilasters and molding to outline the building’s geometry
concrete coffering to decrease the weight of the walls and ceilings

content.answer: contrasting stone for pilasters and molding to outline the building’s geometry

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
